import React, {Component} from 'react'; export default class About extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props) this.state = { firstName: 'Brian', lastName:'EPAUD', adress:"17,impasse Théodore Géricault, 85180 Les Sables d'Olonne", phone:"06.23.02.56.63", email:'epaud.brian@gmail.com', bio:'', socials:{ linkedin:'https://www.linkedin.com/in/brianepaud/', twitter:'https://twitter.com/BrianEpaud', facebook:'https://www.facebook.com/brian.epaud', github:'https://github.com/BrianEpaud' } } } render() { return(
{this.state.firstName}

{this.state.lastName}

{this.state.adress} · {this.state.phone} · epaud.brian@gmail.com

I am experienced in leveraging agile frameworks to provide a robust synopsis for high level overviews. Iterative approaches to corporate strategy foster collaborative thinking to further the overall value proposition.

) } }
